head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHUSTER, WERNER A.R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHUSTER, WERNER A.R.

block.p: SCHUSTER-Werner A.R. Of West Islip, Long Island, on August 13, 2000. Beloved husband of Doris. Devoted father of Veronica Deloach, Stephan Schuster and the late Werner H. (Butch) Schuster. Dear brother of Carmen Dehner, Reinhard Schuster and Manfred Schuster. Proud grandfather of Alexis and Dan Jr. Kind father-inlaw of Dan Deloach Sr. Reposing at the Frederick J. Chapey & Sons West Islip Funeral Home (1/4 mile west of the Robert Moses Causeway). Funeral Service Saturday 12:30 PM, St. Luke's Lutheran Church, Bay Shore, Long Island. Interment Pinelawn Memorial Park, Pinelawn, Long Island. Visiting Thursday and Friday, 2-4:30 and 7-9:30 PM.
